author: Alexander N

text: The Rayman soundtracks truly deserves more attention especially Rayman 2 which had such a mysterious and magical feel to it have a good listen to it sometime
author: Nijipoop

text: It is pretty sad that Rayman is as underrated as he is. The original Rayman was one of the first games I ever remember playing and Rayman 2 was one of my most played games ever on the N64. I am just so glad that Origins and Legends are such fantastic games and that Ubisoft treated the character with such care (and amazing art!). Now I want to see a new 3D Rayman game in the vein of Rayman 2 and 3!
author: tmark66

text: Or a Rayman 2 port. OH WAIT!
author: Andyoats

text: In my opinion this is the best Rayman. Great upload
author: Klejdi Rexhepi

text: This game is so underrated, when people talk about Rayman, it's almost always Rayman 2 or Origins / Legends. I mean, they're good games, but this one is amazing too, and still plays really well.
author: Osha

text: +Osha I dont really think it's 'underrated', as much as it's a forgotten gem. The original Rayman is regarded as one of the best 2D platformers on the Playstation, and once you mention the original Rayman, most people go nuts from nostalgia.
author: DanAppeared

text:

text: I remember this song so vividly. The whole game has a very lovely OST, but as stated, they do all feel short. This game was, and still is one of my all time favourites.
author: James

text: I love this game, even though I've never managed to beat it.  From what I remember you need to save all, if not then a lot, of those caged pink creatures (forgot their names).  It's also rather difficult, but still this game is a lot of fun and has some great music tracks.
